transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji
Executive: Ji Brahma se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Ji
Executive: Ji Rishabh baat kar raha hu sir India Mart se kal baat hui thi na aapne
Customer: Ha bhaiyya
Executive: Ji sir actually aapka email hamare paas receive hua tha jisme aapne ye mention kiya tha on an average
Customer: Ha bilkul
Executive: To main wahi samajhna chah raha hu sir kya uska actual concern tha sir taki usko hum resolve out kar sake
Customer: Wo to aapki taraf se wo aaya tha ki aap kitne satisfy hai
Executive: Achcha
Customer: Online ki taraf wo wahi chahta ki jitne satisfy hai usme koi dabav thodi hai kisi ka ki main usko excellent hi du
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul koi dabav nahi hai sir main to samajhna chah raha hu sir main us average ko accelerate kaise kar sakta hu maine isliye call kiya sir
Customer: Ha to karo team se baat karo aap apni kya kar sakte hain aap achchi leads de
Executive: Ha to matlab aapko sir leads me dikkat aa raha hai ya fir aapko inquiry me dikkat aa raha hai ya overall inquiry kam aa raha hai kya dikkat aa raha hai thoda sa waise batayenge to hum clarity
Customer: Inquiry bhi kam aa raha hai
Executive: Thik hai
Customer: Aur leads bhi kam hai matlab leads jo hai wo verified nahi hai jisko verified bolte hain na ki actual customer agar hum unse call karte hain ya baat karte hain wo waise nahi hamare nahi hai ye mera matlab nahi hai
Executive: Sir basically main jaise pura catalog aapka dekh raha hu jitne product aapne hamare paas upload kare hain uske hisab se hamare paas har mahine 4500 5000 buyer is par generate ho raha hai sir jo apni requirement dal raha hai
Customer: Hmm
Executive: But on the other part us 4500 ke respect me hum ek do panch saat aath 10 ya maximum pure saal me bolu to pure saal me aapne kisi mahine me maximum 17 valid consume kari hai sir
Customer: Ji
Executive: To buyer jo aa raha hai usko shayad hum late connect kar rahe hain jiski vajah se response rate me thoda sa dikkat pareshani raha hoga sir
Customer: To what we suggest jaise main baat baat samajh rahe ho aap jab vyakti kahi connect karta hai kisi se aur wo lead mature na ho matlab ek karega aap do karenge teen karenge to fir on an average hi kahenge ki chalo thik hai jo aage thik hai nahi to nahi
Executive: Nahi bilkul sahi baat hai sir but aap jaise main october month ki baat karu october month me humne ek by lead consume kiya
Customer: Ji
Executive: Agar main usse pehle jau jab aapne sabse jyada by lead consume kiya tha to wo tha july mahina jisme aapne 17 valid consume kiya tha sir
Customer: Ji
Executive: Ab un 17 valid me 50% valid aisa tha sir jisme humne char ghante ya uske baad connect kiya
Customer: Hmm
Executive: To agar aap soch ke dekhiye sir agar aap ek buyer hai aapne koi requirement dala to aap bhi ye expect karoge ki jaldi se jaldi mere paas buyer ka connectivity supplier ka connectivity ho jaye
Customer: Sir aisa hai bhai sahab baat suno aap samajhiye jab aapne option de rakha hai ki aap apni catalog share karo
Executive: Ha
Customer: Samajh rahe ho aap
Executive: Ji
Customer: Share catalog ka option hai na aapka
Executive: Bilkul hai sir
Customer: Jab humne catalog share kar di to uska matlab kya hai ki humne apni information di hai usko
Executive: Sir wo information bhi hum jo de rahe hain wo late de rahe hain na aap samajh ke dekhna mera jo point hai as India Mart ka ek buyer mere paas din ke 12 baje aaya
Customer: Hmm
Executive: Aapne us buyer ko connectivity sham ke 5 ya 6 baje kari
Customer: Buyer aaya humne by lead humne purchase kari humne connect kiya uske sath
Executive: Ha bilkul sahi keh rahe ho aap aap aur main same page pe hai sir
Customer: Ha
Executive: India Mart ne aapko wo by lead aapke portal par 12 baje dikha diya
Customer: Ji
Executive: Aapne us buyer ko sham ke 5 ya 6 baje call kiya
Customer: Ji
Executive: To wo char se panch ghante jo gaya na sir us beech me kisi aur ne connect kiya hoga
Customer: Hmm
Executive: Jab kisi aur ne connect kiya hoga to waha se uska koi deal chal raha hoga kuch baat chal raha hoga sir main ye nahi keh raha ki convert ho gaya hoga but kuch baat to chal raha hoga sir
Customer: Ha
Executive: To us basis pe jab usne char panch logo se baat kiya to usko ye samajh aaya ki sabhi ke sabhi log jo bhi mere ko product ka price de rahe hain 19 20 wahi hai sir
Customer: Ji
Executive: Jab price mera 19 20 wahi hai to main aur logo ko jyada connect nahi karna chahunga jiski vajah se wo apna response nahi de raha hai
Customer: To hum aapko hum aapko ek cheez suggest karte hain sir ki jaise hi by lead aaye hum aapko usko notification aur by lead wale page par immediately dikha dete hain jitni bhi by lead aap consume karoge na sir aane wale samay me aap koshish karna ki char ghante se kam me agar consume karoge aap to aapka buyer ka response behtar hoga sir
Customer: Thik hai sir
Executive: Ek to ye hai sir dusra sir main ye suggest karunga aapko ki jaise hamare paas inquiries jo aa rahi hai na aur jo by lead aap consume kar rahe hain in par aap lead manager ke through reply kariye sir kabhi kabhar kya hota hai na sir ki aap usko whatsapp karte hain ya aap usko call kar rahe hain wo achchi cheez hai sir but agar usko India Mart ke through ek quotation ek India Mart ke through uske paas message chala jayega aapke aapki taraf se to wo trust gain kar lega hamari taraf jab trust gain karega
Executive: Sir maine na ek option diya hua hai waha par aapko messages ka agar aap India Mart application open karenge na
Customer: Hmm hmm hai option hai
Executive: Ek ek messages ka option hai to wo messages ke option me jaise aap catalog share kar rahe hain wahi par quotation bhi share ho jata hai
Customer: Thik hai sir thik hai sir
Executive: Quotation waha se bhej sakte hain sir
Customer: Uske catalog samajh gaya main ha waha se message wale message wale to fir alag se jayega na
Executive: Message uske sath message shuru me hi shuru me hi jata hai jab hum catalog share karte hain na jaise humne by lead purchase kari to wo catalog ko pehle hi us pe le jata hai sharing pe hum usko ek click me share kar dete hain party ko
Executive: Bilkul sahi hai sir usi ke sath message jo usko product chahiye usi ke sath uska message bhi dal diya humne to isse aapka jo buyer se connectivity hai wo strong ho jata hai agar wo strong hoga to buyer aap pe bharosa karega aur aap se deal leke jayega sir
Customer: Sahi hai
Executive: To aap chahte hain sir main iska pura video meeting ke through ek aapko guidance de sakta hu taki aapke liye thoda sa easy ho jaye
Customer: Ji
Executive: Agar aap available hai to main video meeting arrange kar deta hu sir
Customer: Sir wo to mujhe sara kuch pata hai main pehle se kafi pehle se use kar raha hu aapke executive bhi samay samay pe update karte rehte hain to mera issue nahi hai ki main usko moreover itna ho sakta hai ki main usko 100% operate karna nahi janta lekin main usko 80% to operate kar leta hu website ko apni isko India Mart ke through ki kya hai kahan lead dekhni hai kahan kya karna hai
Executive: Samajh gaya hu sir main aapki baat sahi hai
Customer: Thoda sa humne jo response diya wo isliye diya ki hume jo hai hamari jo by lead thi wo deal me convert nahi hui aur ek bar nahi kai bar hua isliye unhone humse pucha how much you satisfied with the services of India Mart to humne likh diya average
Executive: Nahi bilkul sahi kiya sir aisa feedback to hume chahiye hote hain sir
Customer: Excellent to main to likhta na 5 10 lakh ka business milta mere ko main bolta ki bhai sahab mujhe itna business mil raha hai
Executive: Ha ji
Customer: To ab main ye dusri jo aati hai aapki ye konsi basic se upar hai jo virtual
Executive: Nahi bilkul achcha kiya sir aapne ye
Customer: Hai na
Executive: Ha aapne achcha kiya sir feedback diya main bhi thoda sa aur dhyan deta hu company feedback ke liye tabhi puchti hai ki kaisa lagta hai aapko to humne jo jaise ek chai ki dukan pe bhi jate hain na chai chai coffee pe bol puchh lete hain wo log bhi reception pe ki how was it to ye to 30 40 hazar kharch ke liye bhi seva hai
Executive: Bilkul sahi hai sir main wo koshish puri karunga sir ki jo aapne on an average likha hai agle ek se do mahine me usko excellent pe hum leke jaye aapka bharosa hoga tabhi hum aage grow kar payenge sir
Customer: Ha nahi thik hai
Executive: Thik hai abhi ke liye sir ye concern ko main close karta hu aur agle ek hafte ke liye hum aapki puri services ko track karte hain ki sahi ja raha hai aage ya kahi nahi ja raha hai agar kisi karan se sahi nahi ja raha hoga to us par hum kya kya kam kar sakte hain usko dobara discuss karenge agle tuesday ko
Customer: Thik hai sir thik hai sir
Executive: Thik hai na aap ye mera number save kar sakte hain sir Rishabh ke naam se aapki services meri hi team me dekhi ja rahi hai sir aap mera number hai ji 48768240 ji sir yahi mera number hai sir
Customer: Thik hai koi nahi main kar sir main whatsapp number se bhi aapko ek bar hi bhej deta hu taki aapke paas easily connectivity rahe sir
Customer: Thik hai
Executive: Sir sir ye concern main close kar du fir apne end se ha isko kar do aap close
Executive: Thik hai isko main close kar deta hu
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issues with buyleads quality.

- Inquiries and leads are less.

- Leads are not verified.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to improve buylead quality.

- Executive suggested using lead manager for replies.

- Executive offered a video meeting for guidance.

- Executive will track services for a week.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on next Tuesday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, lead manager, quotation, connectivity
